fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: *Haunt a player who voted you the day you were hanged. You must use this ability if you have a charge, or it will be randomized. 0 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
*You retain this role's ability and attributes across future games, until you have used your ability at least once.
*If you are hung, gain a charge of your ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get yourself hanged at any cost. You may win after the game ends.
